de.erichseifert.gral.plots.legends

Class AbstractLegend.Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.AbstractDrawable
      • de.erichseifert.gral.graphics.DrawableContainer
        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.legends.AbstractLegend.Item

    Container, Drawable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Drawable>
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractLegend

    protected static class AbstractLegend.Item
extends DrawableContainer
    Class that displays a specific data source as an item of a legend.
